reviewText: Stella and sam is a great show! My 3 year old absolutely loves it. Great show that encourages imagination and outdoor play

My three year old and six year old love these movies, and I do too. The stories are sweet, about sibling love, imagination, and a love of the outdoors, all values I want to encourage in my children. The individual episodes are a nice length and can keep the attention of even my youngest one. I definitely recommend any of the Sam and Stella DVDs!
Terrific, great product and really fast service
My 2 year old loves it and watches it almost everyday. Shipping was as expected and no problems with the DVD.Thanks

Stella and Sam is an awesome preschool animated series that encourages children to imagine different things in a backyard meadow like Stella and Sam. It's perfect for everyone who loves the great outdoors and to perform activities whether it is indoors or outdoors. Follow Me is a great episode for the kids to do Follow the leader, I like how they act like a squirrel. I recommend this DVD for every preschooler who loves Stella and Sam. Even grown-ups can let their Inner Child out and join in.
I found this series on SPROUTS TV and was quickly taken by its soft and gentle tone. Stories are sweet and joyful.  I love it.  I bought this for my granddaughter. I also enjoy watching it.
